survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Telehealth Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from patients about their satisfaction with telehealth services, including ease of use, quality of care, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall telehealth experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall telehealth experience?

questions.question_text: Which of the following telehealth platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question with checkboxes and an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following telehealth platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing telehealth over an in-person visit?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field to capture additional reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question with radio buttons and an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing telehealth over an in-person visit?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of scheduling a telehealth appointment?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure ease of scheduling.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of scheduling a telehealth appointment?

questions.question_text: Please describe any technical difficulties you encountered during your telehealth visit.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback on technical issues.

script.question_text: Please describe any technical difficulties you encountered during your telehealth visit.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use telehealth services again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of future use.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use telehealth services again in the future?
